price: 115. Yalli seehada tirri heek gamadal makkoysam maaba kaak edde meesitaanam как faxximtam kee diinik kah ceyitti iyyaanam baxxaqqa keenih haam fanah, diggah Yalli ummaanim yaaxigi kinni.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُضِلَّ قَوۡمَۢا بَعۡدَ إِذۡ هَدَىٰهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُبَيِّنَ لَهُم مَّا يَتَّقُونَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna al-lahu liyuḍilla qawman baʿda idh hadāhum ḥattā yubayyina lahum mā yattaqūna inna al-laha bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
